content: stitch* repeat to end of round 72 stitches round 11 knit 72 stitches round 12 *knit 8 knit in the front and back of the next stitch* repeat to end of round 80 stitches round 13 knit 80 stitches round 14 *knit 9 knit in the front and back of the next stitch* repeat to end of round 88 stitches increase a few more rounds every other round in multiples of 8 if you re knitting with a smaller yarn knit in plain stockinette for approximately 6 total measure from cast-­ on then change to a k2 p2 rib for another 5 or so finished hat should be approximately 10-­ 11 from end to end bind off loosely i like jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off here is a link to a youtube video explaining jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=abbhe-­ jymgi
